mapper.update:
UPDATE channel_service_config
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId},
channel_code = #{channelCode},
channel_service_name = #{channelServiceName},
channel_service_type = #{channelServiceType},
channel_service_method = #{channelServiceMethod},
channel_service_url = #{channelServiceUrl},
if_encrypted = #{ifEncrypted},
if_decrypt = #{ifDecrypt},
encrypt_type = #{encryptType},
state = #{state},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
